outputs.output_descr: Support to 16 cities spread over four states to carry out property tax and accounting reforms and to prepare City Development Plan. Capacity of staff in Urban Local Bodies is strengthened through training on accounting and property tax reforms and provision of expertise to prepare gender-sensitive city development plans.

project_descr: Capacity Building for Decentralized Urban Governance.
project_title: Capacity Building for Decentralized Urban Governance
